trans-unit.source: Marshals the COM <see langword="IEnumVARIANT" /> interface to the .NET Framework <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> interface, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 將 COM <see langword="IEnumVARIANT" /> 介面封送處理 (Marshal) 至 .NET Framework <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 介面，或是反向操作。

trans-unit.source: This custom marshaler marshals `IEnumVARIANT` to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> and marshals <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> to `IEnumVARIANT`.
trans-unit.target: 此自訂封送處理器封送處理`IEnumVARIANT`至<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>和把<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>至`IEnumVARIANT`。

trans-unit.source: The CLR automatically uses this class to bridge COM enumerators and .NET enumerators.
trans-unit.target: CLR 會自動使用這個類別，以橋接器 COM 列舉值和.NET 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> type returned by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method in the imported COM class uses `EnumeratorToEnumVariantMarshaler` to map the calls to the `IEnumVARIANT` interface pointer returned by the COM object's member with a DISPID of -4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>傳回型別<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>中匯入的 COM 類別的方法會使用`EnumeratorToEnumVariantMarshaler`對應呼叫`IEnumVARIANT`-4 的 dispid 的 COM 物件的成員所傳回的介面指標。

trans-unit.source: The managed object to be destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 要終結的 Managed 物件。

trans-unit.source: Performs necessary cleanup of the managed data when it is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 針對不需要的 Managed 資料執行必要的清除。

trans-unit.source: The CLR calls this method to clean up managed data allocated in the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshalers.EnumeratorToEnumVariantMarshaler.MarshalNativeToManaged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: CLR 會呼叫這個方法，以清除受管理的資料配置在<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshalers.EnumeratorToEnumVariantMarshaler.MarshalNativeToManaged%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the unmanaged data to be destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 要終結的 Unmanaged 資料指標。

trans-unit.source: Performs necessary cleanup of the unmanaged data when it is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 針對不需要的 Unmanaged 資料執行必要的清除。

trans-unit.source: The CLR calls this method to clean up the unmanaged data allocated in the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshalers.EnumeratorToEnumVariantMarshaler.MarshalManagedToNative%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: CLR 會呼叫這個方法，以清除 unmanaged 資料配置在<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshalers.EnumeratorToEnumVariantMarshaler.MarshalManagedToNative%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: String "cookie" parameter that can be used by the custom marshaler.
trans-unit.target: 可由自訂封送處理器使用的字串 "cookie" 參數。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the custom marshaler.
trans-unit.target: 傳回自訂封送處理器 (Marshaler) 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the custom marshaler.
trans-unit.target: 自訂封送處理器的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: All custom marshalers must implement this method, although it is not part of the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomMarshaler> interface definition.
trans-unit.target: 所有的自訂封送處理器必須實作這個方法，但不是屬於<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomMarshaler>介面定義。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size in bytes of the unmanaged data to be marshaled.
trans-unit.target: 傳回待封送處理之 Unmanaged 資料的大小，以位元組為單位。

trans-unit.source: -1 to indicate the type this marshaler handles is not a value type.
trans-unit.target: -1 表示這個封送處理器所處理的型別並非實值型別 (Value Type)。

trans-unit.source: Because custom marshaling of value types is not supported in the .NET Framework, this method always returns -1.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 中不支援自訂的實值類型封送處理，因為這個方法一律會傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: The managed object to be converted.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Managed 物件。

trans-unit.source: Marshals an object from managed code to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 封送處理物件，從 Managed 程式碼到 Unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the unmanaged object.
trans-unit.target: Unmanaged 物件的指標。

trans-unit.source: The CLR calls this method with the specified instance of a managed object to convert that object from managed code to unmanaged code, and it returns a pointer to the appropriate unmanaged object, representing the COM view of that object.
trans-unit.target: CLR 會呼叫這個方法與指定的執行個體的受管理物件來將該物件從 managed 程式碼轉換成 unmanaged 程式碼，並讓指標回到適當的 unmanaged 物件，表示該物件的 [COM] 檢視。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pManagedObj" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pManagedObj" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the unmanaged object to be converted.
trans-unit.target: 待轉換的 Unmanaged 物件的指標。

trans-unit.source: Marshals an object from unmanaged code to managed code.
trans-unit.target: 封送處理物件，從 Unmanaged 程式碼到 Managed 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A managed object.
trans-unit.target: Managed 物件。

trans-unit.source: The CLR calls this method with the specified pointer to an unmanaged object to convert that object from unmanaged code to managed code, and returns a managed object representing the managed view of the unmanaged data.
trans-unit.target: CLR 會呼叫這個方法與將該物件從 unmanaged 程式碼，managed 程式碼，unmanaged 物件的指定指標，並傳回代表 unmanaged 資料的 managed 的檢視受管理的物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pNativeData" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pNativeData" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The unmanaged object that <paramref name="pNativeData" /> points to could not be converted.
trans-unit.target: 無法轉換 <paramref name="pNativeData" /> 指向的 Unmanaged 物件。
